definition: to do/to manage/to handle/to play with/to fool with/to mess with/to fix/to toy with

sentences.english: Memories of culture are kept in streets and alleys of Taichung City.
sentences.chinese: 文化的记忆也保存在台中市的街头巷弄里。

sentences.english: Only the laughter of children echoes in the lanes.
sentences.chinese: 只有孩童的嘻笑声，依然回荡在城市的巷弄里。

definition: road or pavement laid with flagstones
Jiepang (Chinese location-based social networking service for mobile devices, in operation 2010-2016)
military dependents' village (community established in Taiwan for Nationalist soldiers and their dependents after the KMT retreated from the mainland in 1949)
tenement building, typically of 2-4 stories, with a shop on the ground floor and upper floors used for residential purposes (esp. in southern China)
winding corridor/cloister/ambulatory (covered walkway around a cloister)
